text:
You won’t hear another peep out of me given this is clearly your top priority and the kids are in your rear view now.
I’m completely changing my focus.
Message 3596 of 4024
I’m done.
I’m not fighting anything.
I’m focusing on our kids.
You win the money battles.
That is not worth it to me.
Sent:07/11/2024 at 01:51 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/11/2024 at 05:23 PM)
Subject:Re: Rosen
Message 3597 of 4024
You should have everything you asked for. Everything. I did not push back on a single demand. Nothing. You refused when I tried to work with you
to honor your commitments, even after giving away or canceling 140-person nights at a five-star resort that I could have used. You went above and
beyond to screw me, cancel me and give away community property.
You did not compromise or work together on a single item—nothing. Even though you have a full salary and our cheaper home mortgage because of
my decisions to purchase and refinance, And, you actually stalled both of those things. Although you never had an issue with the cost disparity when I
was in the dump in West Seattle, you just won't allow equity in our lives.
Of course that's the money. You have stolen 99.9% of our kids.  I'll focus on that theft now.
Sent:07/11/2024 at 03:00 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/11/2024 at 05:07 PM)
Subject:Re: Rosen
Message 3598 of 4024
I am seeing things today that really make me worried. I am not trying to bash you at all. I am honestly asking if you need help, a break, or some time to
collect your thoughts. Or perhaps you are just too busy to think things through properly. I have been there many times and it's ok.
But I am genuinely concerned about you, Christine. Can I help?
Sent:07/11/2024 at 04:43 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/11/2024 at 05:05 PM)
Subject:Are you Ok?
